Gedung terkesan tua dan kurang terawat. Mungkin dampak pendemi.

Hotel ini menawarkan kenyamanan bagi anda yang ingin melakukan perjalanan wisata dengan pengalaman yang simpel dan bebas dari rasa khawatir. Soal fasilitas, hotel ini menyediakan berbagai pilihan paket kamar yang dapat disesuaikan dengan kebutuhan dan budget anda. Anda juga tidak perlu khawatir soal akses ke tempat-tempat wisata. Karena hotel ini cukup strategis berada di kawasan yang tidak jauh dari pusat kota Bandung. Anda akan dimudahkan dengan akses transportasi baik massal (angkot) maupun privat (taksi). Meskipun berada dekat dengan pusat kota, bagi anda yang ingin melepas stress tidak perlu khawatir. Karena hotel ini terlepas dari hiruk pikuk kemacetan kota. Lokasinya yang dekat pula dengan taman dan pedestrian yang asri nan sejuk sangat sesuai untuk anda yang suka bepergian dengan berjalan kaki. Urusan tempat bersantai dan menikmati kuliner serta minuman, akan dipuaskan dengan kehadiran restoran yang terletak di lounge. Jangan takut soal sarapan, semua lengkap dan tersedia pada pagi hari hingga pukul 10.00 untuk weekday dan  pukul 11.00 untuk weekend. Sekial ulasan saya, semoga membantu dan dapat dijadikan rekomendasi. Salam hangat.

text: Weekend??? Bandung??? text:
Lokasi yang strategis di Jalan Setia budhi merupakan kawasan bisnis kuliner dan Factory Outlet seperti Rumah Mode. Hanya butuh kurang dari 5 menit jalan kaki sudah sampai di rumah Mode. 

Kamar hotel dan toiletnya kurang bersih karena kami menginap untuk kamar non smoking toom ternyata bau rokok. Sistem plumbing yang tidak baik sehingga toilet beraroma tidak enak. 

Pelayanan staff reception dan rasa kopi hitam yang nikmat.
title: Lokasi dekat dengan Rumah Mode

text: Samping hotel ada bar/pub jadi malem2 keganggu sm dentuman suaranya,,harga oke, staf ramah, breakfast variatif, cuma rasa nya kurang,,lokasi strategis, kamar bersih, cuma kamar sy ac nya gk dingin,,bt deh,,thanks hemangini,,

text: Untuk harga yg cukup terjangkau, fasilitas di hotel ini ok. Staff sangat ramah dan helpful, kamar cukup besar dan semua fasilitas ada, letak hotel jg strategis. Sedikit kekurangan hanya pada kebersihan (di lantai ada sisa makanan, warna handuk dan keset tidak putih bersih), serta apapun yg lewat di lorong terdengar jelas ke kamar seperti org tutup pintu, anak kecil berlarian maupun roda yg lewat)
title: Sesuai harga

text: Jadi saya dan kedua teman saya berasal dari medan, kami lulus pelatihan yang diadakan di lembang hari senin tgl 31, jadi sebelum tgl 31 kami berniat jalan" sehari di bandung dulu, dan memilih hotel ini dari traveloka karna letaknya strategis, dan kualitas hotelnya sangat oke, dan keramahan pegawai hotel sangat baik, semoga hotel hemangini tetap mempertahankan kualitas hotelnya.
title: Nyaman, murah, dan bersih hotelnya

text:
Saya menginap 4 malam di Hotel ini
Saya suka sekali, pertama lobby nya nyaman, ada kolam ikan nya
Pelayanannya cukup memuaskan,  Receptionist gesit, sangat membantu
Untuk makanan juga bervariasai, enak sekali
Next, saya akan menginap lagi Di Hemangini Hotel
title: Good Hotel

text: Lokasi sangat strategis, hotenyal bersih dan nyaman, pelayanan sangat ramah. Menjadi tempat favorit keluarga untuk menginap dan bermain. Lokasinya sangat dekat dengan pusat belanja rumah mode. Harga yang relatif terjangkau juga menjadi pilihan utama
title: Hemangini

text: Saya menginap di sini karena banyak review positif dr member TripAdvisor lainnya. Dan pilihan saya tidak salah, hotel ini lokasinya strategis, dekat FO Rumah Mode, dan shuttle point Selamat Trans (shuttle jurusan Karawang-Bandung pp). Proses checkin dan checkout cepat, dan tamu diminta deposit hanya 100rb saja. Tersedia jg welcome drink beserta snack berupa gorengan, cm saya ga sempet coba. Kamar cukup besar dan nyaman, amenities lengkap, kekurangannya cuma di shower air panas yg agak lama keluarnya. Sarapan pagi juga banyak jenisnya, ada juga nasi kuning, dan soto padang, juga poridge dan bubur kacang hijau, dessert. Semuanya enak, kecuali puding agarnya kurang menurut saya. Overall saya puas menginap di sini, dan hotel ini jd salah satu hotel favorit saya jika saya ke Bandung lagi
title: Hotel Terjangkau dengan Fasilitas Komplit

title: Monday escapes

text:
Hotelnya strategis. Dekat dengan food court, Rumah Mode, Store Eiger, hampir dekat dengan wisata lainnya.
Hotelnya nyaman dan luasnya standar hotel. Perlengkapan mandinya lumayan lengkap. Di dalam kamar mandinya ada, shower, toilet, dan washtafel (agak sempit kamar mandinya, namun cukup). Di dalam kamar ada, lemari, sofa, meja kerja, twin bed, televisi, wifi, kulkas, dan penerangan yang cukup untuk istirahat (redup).
Makanan di restaurant-nya tidak banyak dan rasanya hambar. Jadi saya kurang puas dengan makanan di restaurantnya.
title: Dekat Pusat Perbelanjaan

text: Hotelnya simple kamarnya besar dengan 2 twin beds yg cukup Luas.kamar mandi besar..bersih wangi dan nyaman kamarnya.ada kolam berenang gak terlalu besar sih tp cukup menyenangkan bagi anak kalo mau berenang.makanannya variasi kurang banyak tp enak.lokasinya strategis..dan disbrang hotel banyak tukang makanan sate ayam n bakso enak dan murmer
title: Simple place to stay
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan ASUS 6 Stub App Smartphone

text: kamar bagus, sarapan lumayan banyak variasinya. Pelayanan cepat. fasilitas kamar ada kulkas dan ini sangat bermanfaat bagi saya dan teman2 karena membawa jenis makanan yang harus disimpan di kulkas kalau tidak akan basi. tidak kebayang kalau kamar tidak memiliki kulkas.
title: Rapi dan bersih

text: Yang saya suka Lokasi hotel ini cukup strategis. Dekat dengan Factory Outlet Rumah Mode dan store Eiger. Yang perlu menjadi koreksi ialah pelayanan. Seperti saya request tempat tidur double tapi diberikan yang twin. Request resepsionis untuk disatukan tapi tidak disatukan. Sehingga saya menyatukannya sendiri.
title: Lokasi strategis

text: Saya menginap di hotel ini selama 3 hari 2 malam untuk rapat kerja. Hotel cukup nyaman, bersih, dan wangi. Sangat bisa direkomendasikan apabila perlu menginap untuk meeting atau bisnis. Para staffnya cukup ramah saat ditanya mengenai password wifi dan hal-hal lainnya. Apabila menginap saat bulan Ramadhan, ada paket makan sahur dan buka puasa, juga bisa minta dibangunkan pada saat sahur. Makanan saat sahur standar (ada sayur, daging, dan buah-buahan), menu makanan berbeda tiap harinya. Kamar cukup bersih dan lega, dengan saluran TV yang bagus. Fasilitas kolam renang mengecewakan, kolamnya terlalu kecil dan tidak cukup bersih. Secara keseluruhan, hotel ini bagus tapi tidak untuk menginap terlalu lama.
title: Cukup Nyaman, Bersih, dan Wangi

photos.caption: Lorong di belakang ruang meeting menuju kolam renang.

text:
Awalnya penasaran sama hotel ini karena review bagus...akhirnya kita book di tanggal 30 januari 2016. Petugas front officenya sangat cekatan dan ramah. Hotel ini tergolong baru so semua masih memuaskan. Lokasi juga strategis dan mudah banget buat cari makan dengan hanya cukup berjalan kaki. yeeeeyyy....

Mulai agak kecewa saat menuju kolam renang..Melalui website sudah terlihat sih kalau kolam renangnya kecil tapi it is okay menurut saya karena hanya untuk anak - anak..yang bikin kecewa...kolam renang yang besar tidak bisa digunakan dan kotor...alhasil anak2 hanya bermain air di kolam kecil.

Kembali kecewa adalah breakfastnya...Kami kira dengan harga yang gak tergolong murah harapan saya menu breakfast lengkap tetapi tidak demikian fresh milk, roti - roti kecil dan cereal tidak ada. Makanan tidak di-refill...seharusnya meskipun jam breakfast sudah mau habis tapi saat masih ada tamu yaaa jangan ampe kosong dan didiamkan.

kebetulan kami book di kamar executive dimana perbedaan dengan tipe kamar dibawahnya adalah kamar executive disediakan snack sore. Ini yang perlu jadi perhatian juga...sebaiknya snack sore dihidangkan saat tamu itu sudah datang. jadi makanannya tidak dingin dan keras.
title: Just Ordinary Hotel

text: Yang saya sukai dari Hotel ini adalah nilai kemewahan yang saya dapatkan dengan harga yang sangat masuk akal. Lokasi hotel yang ditengah kota juga sangat membantu. Kebersihan hotel bagus, hanya untuk lokasi2 yang tidak terjangkau (dibawah kursi & meja) masih ditemui debu dan sisa kotoran yang tdk terangkat. Menu sarapan mungkin sebaiknya ditambahkan variasi, dan tetap dipenuhi selama masih ada tamu yang akan sarapan.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
The hotel is close to Rumah Mode, a well-known outlet store in Bandung, and close to several good restaurants and eateries, and to Setiabudhi Supermarket. MOst of your needs are within walking distance from the hotel. It is also within 10 minute drive to Cihampelas, a popular shopping spot. 

The staff are very helpful and friendly. Housekeeping service can be slow.

The rooms are standard. The lighting is a bit dark and the interior is dull, but pretty spacious. And the wifi is fast. I was able to  stream full-feature movies using the in room wifi.

The food is good, as you can find in the breakfast buffet, though food variety is lacking. 

The swimming pool is tiny. It's more like a Jacuzzi pool. Good for a dip and for children, but severely insufficient for doing laps.

I don't mind coming back here.
title: Good location, good value

text:
Located in Jl. Setiabudhi, not far from Rumah Mode.
The room, bed, breakfast, shower were good. I was quite satisfied while I stayed there. They have a basement parking, beside a parking area in front of their lobby. Their service was good. The room's soundproof was quite good, I wasn't bothered by any noises. I can happily recommend this hotel.
title: Not far from Rumah Mode

This HOTEL have a nice ambient, good food, good service and most off all they have a small nice swimming pool, where my kids love it so much.

text: Most friendly, sweet and helpful receptionist (Ms. Wida), giving me directions to all shopping centres and facilitating an early check in. The hotel was clean and stylish with well equipped and comfortable rooms. Food was good and great value for money. The overall standard of the hotel and exceptional service from the staff making my trip to Bandung a pleasant one and although short and sweet, I hope to be back for a longer visit in the future.

text: I stayed in the family suits. And its worthed the cost! The bed was comfy, air conditioner was working perfectly. The staff was nice and friendly. Room services was quick. And the bathroom just perfect, with the hot water bathtub. Just perfect!!! Absolutely will be back here again!!!!

title: Good optional hotel on a budget

text:
Location is in Setiabudi area and few steps from Rumah Mode Factory Outlet.
We booked through online travel, but then we found its cheaper booked direct to the Hotel.
We stayed in Superior room included breakfast for two. Front office staff was very nice and our processed check in was not any issue. After we came up to the room on 3rd floor, we found that our room is at the corner and the hallway is very dark. We came down to Reception again and asked for another room, she gave us room on 4th floor in front of the elevator. At night we came down for fast food, front of the hotel there are Yoshinoya, Korean Restaurant, Coffee shop, Gelato Cafe and Minimarket. So it was easy to find food or drinks surrounding this hotel. Before slept we checked that our pillow was smell very bad until we asked them to change it.
Breakfast, the taste of the foods was great and varieties of food are not much but enough.
title: Worth for budget Hotel

title: Marvelous Hotel in  Bandung

text:
Four star hotel... located near major roads, gas stations, ATMs, Alfamart, places to eat (McD, KFC, Hokben, Sederhana, Yoshinoya, etc). At the hotel the parking lot is not wide enough but there is security who is ready to help, in the lobby we can enjoy the welcome drink that has been provided and there is a fish pond, swings and a modern hotel design. 

   We arrived around 12 noon, the room was ready and we could go straight into the room, incidentally on weekdays it wasn't too crowded, assisted by the FO staff (female) who were very friendly and gave us the room we wanted.

Seasonal themed room types:
 >> Autumn
 >> Summer
 >> Spring
We stayed in the autumn type room because we liked the swing and the atmosphere of the room.
~ The room wasn't too big but it was enough for us.
~ Not too much furniture. 
~ The facilities and amenities in the room are quite complete.
~The internet working properly.
~ The room isn't soundproof so we could hear sounds from outside the room. 
~ Hot water not too hot.
~ No dnd and make up room sign ??!. 
~ The view is facing the building next to it. ~ The swimming pool is small, the water is cold.
~ Pool towels are available.
~ There are not many choices for breakfast but the taste is pretty good. 
~The staff are friendly and helpful.

  While staying here we were happy and enjoy. The Hemangini hotel can be an option to stay for families.

FYI : Deposit IDR 100,000
Add Breakfast : IDR 60,000 (< 12 yrs), IDR 100,000 (> 12 yrs).

 *** Thank you ***
title: Seasonal themed hotel rooms.

text: My family stayed at Hemangini few days ago. We visited meeting room for our next event. Planned to arrange family gathering either office seminar.  Its quiet cozy besides the renovated rooms is a good choice to refresh while  pandemi is still on.  Hemangini Hotel recomended hotel with a choices of Bandung distro & culinary surounded. Success!

text:
Friendly staff! - affordable accommodation in one of the best local area. Easy access & close to most local shopping area & attraction. 
Local warungs across the road to satisfy our late night cravings. Free flow of iced cold drinks during the day & hot bandrek at night at the lobby. We had an in room massage one night which was nice. 
Rooms were clean but could use a little updating; painting etc
Some towels and linens are a little aged.
One bed linen wasn’t clean upon check in, talked to the housekeeping staff & it was changed within minutes.
We met their GM, Pak Yos upon check out. Gave us complimentary coffee over a friendly chat with tips on local food & attraction. On top of that, we were given free airport transfer. Makasih, Pak Yos & team.
title: Friendly hotel

I opted for non-breakfast rooms, so I can't tell how was it. But there are lots of restaurants and a supermarket nearby.

text:
Special thanks to Hemangini Hotel.
I would like to mention in particular the fabulous individual staff.
Without doubt one of the favorite hotels I stayed during my time in Bandung!
Most friendly and helpful receptionist ever, so lovely and great first impression of hotel. Upon arrival I'm warmly welcomed by the staff and general manager. The staff was extremely friendly. This hotel is always welcoming, the same hospitality they would show to your friends/family when you invite them to your house.
From the frontdesk staff: Guruh, Icha, Wida, Firman, Dahlan.
Thanks a bunch to Mr Guruh for all his loyalty, always follow up with updates of promotional room rates. This is awesome. Well done for building a meaningful communication with your guests regularly after checking out of the hotel. Excellent job Mr Guruh! 
There is no other word than perfect! 

Hemangini Hotel Bandung is ideally located with all tourist attractions within short walk to Rumah Mode and Paris Van Java including there are many ATM machines available near to the hotel.

The rooms are spacious and very clean with great decor. If you want a place to relax, that's close to shopping, restaurants and eateries, this is the place to be. Highly recommended.

The foyer is always clean and there's aways evening drink for all guests, free flow of bandrek and lemon tea. Definitely good after a long day outside. Love it!

I would also like to pass thanks to the Head Chef and kitchen staff who prepared the most delicious lunch and dinner with great portion sizes. The food was unbelievable! Thank you so much.
The restaurant very clean and comfortable (appreciate this!) and the restaurant staff deserves a special thanks..
To all the restaurant staff: Arif, Akbar, Nisa.
Specially to Arif, a super amazing multitasking man! Arif always served me with a fresh coffee for breakfast. Awesome! And thank you for making time helping me get those delicious harum manis on every of my visit in Bandung. Delicious manggo!
Thanks to Septi for making nice well done omelette and waffle every morning. 

To security Bapak Luky, Bapak Ade, Bapak Kundrat. The heroes of Hemangini Hotel! Always schedule time to time about guest safety. 

I've stayed repeatedly  during my business trip at Hemangini Hotel Bandung.

My first  30th November - 3rd December 2017 (5days)

My long-term stayed 9th November - 27th November 2018 (19days)

And my recent , 22nd January - 29th January 2019 (8days)

This hotel is so amazing with a feeling of 5 star service. I can highly recommend the Hemangini Hotel Bandung.

The atmosphere is so special that it really felt like home to me. 

All respect for the General manager and the  Management who does a great job here; a true sample of excellent hospitality!
I was very pleased with my stay. (recommendable!). I truly enjoyed. 
See you soon!
title: Highly Recommended Hemangini Hotel Bandung

text:
I selected the Hemangini because of location and consider a new hotel which I expected to get fresh linen and towels.

I got a warm welcome and efficient Check-In process. Even they allowed me to enter the room without extra charge for being arrived couple hours earlier.
The front desk staff were friendly and helpful.
I am not a breakfast person. The buffet breakfast was pretty big within the dominantly Indonesian food, which includes some Indonesian cakes and fruit, I saw an egg station and slices of bread. I did not expect those extensive display for a 3 star hotel refer to the room rate I paid. 
I felt the Hemangini boutiquely with the wooden feature, spacious lobby and restaurant. Spacious corridor too.

During my stay, I was disturbed by people talking quite loud in the corridor and the children screamed. I don't know whether the hotel constructed with a thin wall or the noise entered from the unsealed door.

The shower box without a door and the glass wall got like a permanent watermark. 
The main issue was the shower floor was slippery. Beware.

I will stay in Hemangini again in the future.
title: Comfortable Stay

text: My husband and friends and I stayed at this hotel for two nights in August 2018. We were looking for a cheap but decent hotel in Bandung. We were backpacking and basically only using the hotel for a bed and quick breakfast. I thought this hotel was a bit old and dirty but the bed was comfy enough. The shower didn't have a full door on it, so the water basically got all over the floor. There was also no place to put soap/shampoo bottles in the shower. Also, my husband and I come from Alaska, so we like it cold in our room. Unfortunately, the air con didn't make the room very cold and it also leaked all over the floor in our bedroom. We had the breakfast which had a lot of local Indonesian options but not many items that the Western traveler would like. I still tried some of the foods but it wasn't my favorite. There is bread and jams for those who are picky. The staff was nice and welcoming. To be honest, I would probably spend a bit more and look for a more Western hotel next time I am in Bandung.
title: Average hotel but a decent price

text:
Stayed in this hotel on March 26th 2018 in Family Suite Room. Check in and Check out Process was very quick and the receptionist was very polite and gave warm greeting (that's was plus point in this hotel). The room position was a little bit awkward, because the door position just in front of the elevator door (in the fifth floor if i'm not wrong). The room equipped with 2 Separate room and living room. Each of room equipped with Big King Size bed, more than enough for 4 adults. The bed sheet was not so clean.

They equipped the room with mini refrigerator and coffee maker.

One of the most annoying thing was the lightning in the room and in the hotel hallway, because the old design hotel and the yellow dim light sure will make a little bit spooky condition (perhaps they have to think it again about the lightning system in the hotel) 

The Bathroom equipped with bathtub so your kids can play inside the bathtub. Water flow was very good, hot water stable, The bathroom was clean.

they don't have much food variety for the breakfast, and the taste just standard.

You can get dinner in the restaurant next to the hotel or you can get taxi or grab / go car to go to Paris Van Java Mall and it is not to far from the hotel
Overall this hotel was average and I will think twice to visit this hotel in the future (especially if the lightning condition still the same)
title: Old Hotel In Setiabudi Area

text: Nice location. The hotel is surrounded by a lot of restaurants. The gas station is just across the street with mini market inside. There is a car wash station beside the hotel. So you can wash your car while waiting in the nice hotel. The price is really good. You’ll get a great bed, with 4 big pillow and 2 small pillow. Definitely good for sleep. Nice service. Definitely coming back when we’re back to Bandung!
title: Pre - honeymoon

text:
As the title, it's in a good location. Not too far from the airport or the city, taking into the account the traffic. In its locale, it's quite well placed to cafes, the 'infamous' Rumah Mode factory outlet, convenience stores, etc.

Sadly the rooms are showing its age. It's quite worn to say the least especially the linen. But the hotel makes it up with very good service and pretty good breakfast and dinner, I might add. So it sort of balances thing up if you like.

And yes the price is relatively affordable.
title: Old hotel but in a good location

text: booked the superior room and was not disappointed, pretty comfortable, got 2 chairs and a small table by the window which very useful when my friends suddenly came visiting, the amenities weren't very good though. the receptionist and staffs are friendly, she kindly helped me when i asked to check-in early. pretty big parking space, and a good location. everything else is kinda average, but i liked the atmosphere of the hotel, it's quite relaxing.
title: Wouldn't mind to stay here again

text: De service was uitstekend, ontzettend lieve mensen. Kamers waren prima en schoon echter waren de bedden voor ons te hard. Ontbijt was uitgebreid. Goede locatie met een aantal leuke eetgelegenheden in de buurt.
title: Goede locatie en perfecte service.
